mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as RNUM,s.* from (SELECT r.RE_NUM,i.ITEM_NUM,r.RE_TITLE,r.RE_CONTENT,r.RE_HIT,r.MEM_NUM, to_char(r.RE_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')RE_DATE, r.RE_LIKE,m.MEM_ID FROM REVIEW r, MEMBER m, ITEM i WHERE i.ITEM_NUM = #{ITEM_NUM} AND i.ITEM_NUM = r.ITEM_NUM AND m.MEM_NUM = r.MEM_NUM order by r.RE_NUM desc)s) WHERE RNUM >= #{START_NUM} AND RNUM <= #{END_NUM}
SELECT r.RE_NUM,r.ITEM_NUM,r.RE_TITLE,r.RE_CONTENT, to_char(r.RE_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')RE_DATE, m.MEM_ID FROM REVIEW r, MEMBER m WHERE m.MEM_NUM = r.MEM_NUM and r.RE_NUM=#{RE_NUM}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW( RE_NUM, RE_TITLE, RE_CONTENT, RE_DATE, RE_LIKE, ITEM_NUM, RE_HIT, MEM_NUM ) VALUES ( RE_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{RE_TITLE}, #{RE_CONTENT}, SYSDATE, #{RE_LIKE}, #{ITEM_NUM}, 0, #{MEM_NUM} )
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RE_HIT = NVL(RE_HIT, 0) + 1 WHERE RE_NUM = #{RE_NUM}
mapper.select: select c.CO_NUM,c.CO_CONTENT,c.RE_NUM, to_char(CO_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')CO_DATE,m.MEM_ID FROM COMMENTS c, MEMBER m WHERE c.MEM_NUM = m.MEM_NUM AND RE_NUM=#{RE_NUM}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS( CO_NUM, MEM_NUM, CO_CONTENT, CO_DATE, RE_NUM ) VALUES ( CO_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MEM_NUM}, #{CO_CONTENT}, SYSDATE, #{RE_NUM} )
mapper.update: DELETE FROM COMMENTS WHERE CO_NUM=#{CO_NUM} and MEM_NUM=#{MEM_NUM}
